<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="579.0" prefWidth="894.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.typejam.AboutUsController"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="579.0" prefWidth="894.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="579.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 0; -fx-arc-width: 0;" width="894.0" /> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="490.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-width: 70; -fx-arc-height: 70;" width="797.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" layoutX="46.0" layoutY="13.0" prefHeight="145.0" prefWidth="158.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 100;"> <children> <Button fx:id="back_btn" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onBack" prefHeight="74.0" prefWidth="81.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 100; -fx-border-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="61.0" fitWidth="61.0" mouseTransparent="true" pickOnBounds="false" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/back.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> <HBox.margin> <Insets left="18.0" top="12.0" /> </HBox.margin> </Button> </children> </HBox> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" layoutX="65.0" layoutY="144.0" prefHeight="361.0" prefWidth="774.0"> <children> <ScrollPane fitToWidth="true" hbarPolicy="NEVER" prefHeight="362.0" prefWidth="774.0" style="-fx-background: transparent; -fx-background-color: transparent; -fx-border-color: transparent;"> <content> <VBox alignment="TOP_LEFT" prefHeight="427.0" prefWidth="744.0" spacing="14.0" style="-fx-background-color: transparent;"> <children> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="Welcome to the Bacoor Elementary School Senior High School Typing Game! This project was created to help our SHS students strengthen their typing speed and accuracy while enjoying a fun, interactive experience. In today's digital world, typing is more than just a skill, it's an essential tool for learning, communication, and future careers." textAlignment="JUSTIFY" wrappingWidth="728.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text>
<Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text=" Department of Education Vision" wrappingWidth="588.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="21.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="We dream of Filipinos who passionately love their country and whose values and competencies enable them to realize their full potential and contribute meaningfully to building the nation. As a learner-centered public institution, the Department of Education continuously improves itself to better serve its stakeholders." textAlignment="JUSTIFY" wrappingWidth="730.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text>
<Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text=" Department of Education Mission" wrappingWidth="588.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="21.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="To protect and promote the right of every Filipino to quality, equitable, culture-based, and complete basic education where:Students learn in a child-friendly, gender-sensitive, safe, and motivating environment.Teachers facilitate learning and constantly nurture every learner.Administrators and staff ensure an enabling and supportive environment for effective learning.Families, communities, and stakeholders are actively engaged and share responsibility for developing life-long learners." textAlignment="JUSTIFY" wrappingWidth="730.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="❤ Department of Education Core Values" wrappingWidth="588.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="21.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="To protect and promote the right of every Filipino to quality, equitable, culture-based, and complete basic education where:Students learn in a child-friendly, gender-sensitive, safe, and motivating environment.Teachers facilitate learning and constantly nurture every learner.Administrators and staff ensure an enabling and supportive environment for effective learning.Families, communities, and stakeholders are actively engaged and share responsibility for developing life-long learners." textAlignment="JUSTIFY" wrappingWidth="730.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text>
<Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text=" Developers" wrappingWidth="588.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="21.0" /> </font> </Text>
<Text fill="#2b5237" text="Developed by BSCS students of Cavite State University – Imus Campus" textAlignment="JUSTIFY" wrappingWidth="730.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text> <VBox spacing="5.0"> <children> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="• Lance Adrian Acal"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="• Carlo Jose Anyayahan"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="• Rejay Buta"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="• John Cedrick Delgado"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" text="• Austin Moreno"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="17.5" /> </font> </Text> </children> </VBox> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </content> </ScrollPane> </children> </VBox> <VBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="133.0" layoutY="33.0" prefHeight="137.0" prefWidth="623.0"> <children> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="ABOUT TYPE JAM" textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="348.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="37.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Building confidence, one keystroke at a time." textAlignment="CENTER"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="19.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </VBox> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane fx:id="rootPane" prefHeight="579.0" prefWidth="894.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.typejam.LeaderboardsController"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="579.0" prefWidth="894.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="579.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 0; -fx-arc-width: 0;" width="894.0" /> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="490.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-width: 70; -fx-arc-height: 70;" width="797.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" layoutX="87.0" layoutY="76.0" prefHeight="464.0" prefWidth="719.0"> <children> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="LEADERBOARDS" wrappingWidth="317.734375"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="37.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="See who's leading Type Jam"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="19.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets bottom="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Text>
<!-- Filter Buttons Section --> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="35.0"> <children> <!-- MODE Button (Static - No Dropdown) --> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" spacing="9.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="modeBtn" alignment="CENTER" contentDisplay="CENTER" maxWidth="306.0" minWidth="306.0" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="35.0" prefWidth="306.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2b5237; -fx-background-radius: 20;" text="CHALLENGE MODE" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="19.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </VBox>
<!-- DIFFICULTY Button + Reset --> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" spacing="9.0"> <children> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="6.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="difficultyBtn" alignment="CENTER" contentDisplay="CENTER" maxWidth="306.0" minWidth="306.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#toggleDifficultyDropdown" prefHeight="35.0" prefWidth="306.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2b5237; -fx-background-radius: 20;" text="DIFFICULTY ▼" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="19.0" /> </font> </Button> <Button fx:id="difficultyResetBtn" managed="false" maxHeight="35.0" minHeight="35.0" minWidth="41.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#resetDifficultyFilter" prefHeight="35.0" prefWidth="41.0" style="-fx-background-color: #BE1F1F; -fx-background-radius: 15;" text="X" textFill="WHITE" visible="false"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </HBox> </children> </VBox> </children> <padding> <Insets top="18.0" /> </padding> </HBox>
<!-- Leaderboard Content Area with ScrollPane --> <ScrollPane fitToWidth="true" hbarPolicy="NEVER" prefHeight="291.0" prefWidth="719.0" style="-fx-background: transparent; -fx-background-color: transparent; -fx-border-color: transparent;"> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="18.0" /> </VBox.margin> <content> <VBox fx:id="leaderboardContent" alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="288.0" prefWidth="714.0" spacing="7.0" style="-fx-background-color: transparent;" /> </content> </ScrollPane> </children> </VBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" layoutX="55.0" layoutY="41.0" prefHeight="105.0" prefWidth="109.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 100;"> <children> <Button fx:id="back_btn" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onBack" prefHeight="74.0" prefWidth="81.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 100; -fx-border-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="61.0" fitWidth="61.0" mouseTransparent="true" pickOnBounds="false" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/back.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> <HBox.margin> <Insets left="18.0" top="12.0" /> </HBox.margin> </Button> </children> </HBox>
<!-- Overlay Dropdowns (Positioned Dynamically) -->
